怎么说呢，我是看主播直播入坑的，玩了几局发现特别有意思，虽然说玩人类老是被挂，玩屠夫老是被溜外，其实还是挺不错的，我特喜欢那个凤嘤嘤的兔子皮，喜欢偷偷的修机，啥也不管，队友什么的都不重要，周围都没人玩杀鸡，这游戏属实冷门，希望以后会有越来越多的新人入坑，然后我也可以溜溜新人

I was going for a run in the park, and then it appeared that I was in some sort of strange area in the middle of nowhere. It reminded me of a paintball course with all of those barricades... A lot of palates too. I met up with three others. No matter how we got there, there didn't to be an escape.

And surely death is not an escape.

We found a door. It seemed to require a lot of power so we began repairing generators in the area. It was about to open. It was about to; but then the person with the knife came. We can't get caught. We need to power this door! If we don't... we'll be dead by daylight.

Other than the players who don't know how to relax and the bugs the game is very fun to play and the BVHR is constantly putting out new content and updates to make the game interesting and fun.

[/table]
[/quote][/h1]

《黎明杀机》虽然并不是非对称竞技游戏的开创者，但显然他十分具有代表性，因为通过这款游戏，许多人认识了什么是非对称竞技，也知道了原来以少打多真的可以在游戏中拿下胜利，最起码对于我来说，《黎明杀机》所带来的体验是新奇的，游戏体验也是愉悦的——前提是和朋友玩的情况下。

其实在后来有着不少看到了《黎明杀机》势头，准备模仿的游戏，比如说《灵魂筹码》和《第五人格》，虽然前者已经凉的差不多了，但后者凭借着大量宣发以及移动端玩家对这类游戏的新鲜感，在行业内目前活的还算不错，所以总体来看，非对称竞技游戏的路仍然有着许多被挖掘的空间，也是值得厂商们探索的方向。

回到《黎明杀机》，游戏中最让我印象深刻的便是各种角色，比如魔王的长相就和《最后生还者》中常见的怪物一样恶心，还有大家所熟悉的鬼面就真的是把鬼的面具套在了脸上，以及当年红极一时的杨永信，这些人物的设定不得不说绝对会是《黎明杀机》让人满意的一点。

除了可游玩的那些角色，《黎明杀机》中还有着众多角色是仅在传说中出现的，在未来或许会遇到他们？但不得不说，作为一款非对称竞技游戏有着一系列人物关系将游戏内的人物关联起来，并赋予一个故事的，在玩家们通过不断挖掘并了解了整个故事的时候，可谓相当有趣。

《黎明杀机》的玩法和小时候的捉迷藏一样，只不过在这款游戏中被捉到那可是要Game Over的。作为人类阵营的四名玩家需要打开农场主的发电机，最终打开大门逃离，当然也有着一些密道允许玩家直接逃离，只不过这就非常看运气了。

而看似不那么平衡的屠夫，其实也有着许多技巧帮助着他们来获得胜利，比如说你可以把人挂着而不杀死他，来让存活玩家去救他，只不过这前提是玩家之间要相互有着合作的意愿，如果没有的话那死了就是死了也没人管你，所以这也是为什么开黑互坑之后，游戏会更有意思的原因。

总的来说，《黎明杀机》相当有趣，是非常适合和朋友们一起玩的游戏，只不过缺点也很明显，那就是对于新人不那么友好，如果能够克服下来的话，我相信在数百小时的游戏后，依旧能有着不错的游戏体验，并且也能认识许多朋友。推荐购买。

Dead by Daylight is an interesting experience. Like any multiplayer game, it's better with friends, provided you aren't playing killer. (Two killer, 8 survivor when?) DBD isn't a pay to win game, even with characters and perks you have to pay real money for. Perks for a character can appear in the shrine, and those can be bought for a currency earned for leveling up. It's quite easy to level up, just play the game. If you want something fast, seven bucks isn't too bad. 
The survivor experience gets better with friends, and as you become more skilled, you'll generally have a better time. There's always that one impossible moment that you're looking for, and it's something that won't ever happen again. 
On the flip-side, you have killer. I personally like killer more, so I may be a bit biased. Killer can be fun, provided you know generally how to play. It's all fun and games until the higher ranks, when survivors who know what they're doing will loop you for minutes on end if they're good enough. Those who don't teabag or throw insults in the endgame chat are the ones who should be respected.
 A major problem in the game is the toxicity between killers and survivors. A toxic action will generally lead to a that being repeated and multiplied throughout games. Everyone you play against is a person. Treat them like one, because one day that WILL bite you in the ass. 
Last thing needing to mentioned is balancing. A lot of people complain, all the time. You can never satisfy everyone. There are some overpowered perks or else in the game, but that doesn't mean the game is bad. Have fun playing, and try to play around it if it really bothers you that much. That being said, a lot of things are being reworked quite nicely currently, so I'm quite happy myself.

Basically, it's Among Us but you know who the killer is.
It is a thrilling game where as a survivor you work among your comrades to power generators and escape the map, and as a killer, you walk around as an invincible character to try and sacrifice the survivors. 

it is slightly horror as some killers can look scary, but also gives an adrenaline rush as you try to run away and outsmart the killer to survive until you can escape. 

Truly a great game that allows multiplayer as well as custom local games. No bots unfortunately. 

If you are looking for a thrill/horror game, I'd really recommend this game.
